text: Anayansi Pérez (born 14 September 1976) is a Cuban windsurfer. She competed in the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Mistral One Design Category:Cuban female sailors (sport) Category:Cuban windsurfers Category:Olympic sailors of Cuba
title: Anayansi Pérez
